metadata.name: Scaffold Angular Frontend From Spec
metadata.shortDescription: Scaffold an Angular (Angular Material) consumer UI implementing spec-defined journeys beyond CRUD.
metadata.description: For a demand folder, read the latest functional specification and OpenAPI contract, propose a consumer UI information architecture and journey implementation plan, and (after approval) scaffold an Angular application using Angular Material as the default design system.
objectives: Select latest functional spec and OpenAPI artifacts for a demand
Propose UI journeys and information architecture aligned to the specification
Scaffold an Angular app in apps/{demand_folder}-consumer-ui-ng
Implement key journeys beyond CRUD (scenario-driven screens and flows)
Keep API access aligned to OpenAPI and consumer needs
metadata.author: OLAF Framework
